doc.title: La memoria mortal
doc.plot: ARNE (the captain), accompanied by two occasional companions (DAU and SHE) they travel toward a strange gigantic planet populated of brains. With a ship especially designed for this task, they steal one of them. In the return trip, their two companions untie the treason and the crime, to seize the prized cargo. But because of this, the conspirators will begin to experience strange changes and transformations in their behaviors. Thus they will travel, being sunk day by day each time more toward where the insanity and the memory become matter and death.
